solution_line_template: After smashing one, he has {flower_plates_initial} - {smashed_flower_plates} = <<{flower_plates_initial}-{smashed_flower_plates}={flower_plates_left}>>{flower_plates_left} flower plates left.

In total, he has {flower_plates_left} flower plates + {polka_dotted_plates} polka dotted plates + {checked_plates_initial} checked plates = <<{flower_plates_left}+{polka_dotted_plates}+{checked_plates_initial}={total_plates}>>{total_plates} plates.
